HTMLElementInputDate.summary: The resulting value includes the year, month, and day, but not the time. The input/time and input/datetime-local input types support time and date+time input.

remarks.para: The input UI generally varies from browser to browser; see Browser compatibility for further details. In unsupported browsers, the control degrades gracefully to <input type="text">.
